H3.text: where are you from in malayalam. India

A4.text: There are 144,000 of Malayalam speakers in Malaysia.

A5.text: According to the Indian census of 2011, there were 32,413,213 speakers of Malayalam in Kerala, making up 93.2% of the total number of Malayalam speakers in India, and 97.03% of the total population of the state.

A6.text: Malayalam is spoken by significant numbers of people in India and is the majority language in the state of Kerala.
